data.name: DONATE WITH CREDIT OR DEBIT CARD NOW
data.value: 立即用信用卡捐款

data.name: gift of:
data.value: 捐款：

data.name: I would like to make a
data.value: 我想

data.name: OPEN ALIPAY APP AND DONATE NOW
data.value: 立即打开支付宝APP捐款

data.name: Or scan the QR code below with your Alipay app to donate now:
data.value: 或者用支付宝扫描下面的二维码：

data.name: to help as many people as I can.
data.value: 尽可能多地帮助他们。

data.name: to provide 45 hot meals and care.
data.value: 提供45顿饭菜和关怀。

data.name: to provide 30 hot meals and care.
data.value: 提供30顿饭菜和关怀。

data.name: to provide 60 hot meals and care.
data.value: 提供60顿饭菜和关怀。

data.name: When people come to the Renewal Center, we want to be able to help! Thanks for your summer gift to ensure programs continue all summer long.
data.value: 当无家可归的人们来到日新中心，我们希望能够帮助他们！感谢您的夏日捐赠，它帮助我们在整个夏天持续提供服务。

data.name: monthly
data.value: 每月

data.name: one time
data.value: 一次

data.name: quarterly
data.value: 每季

data.name: yearly
data.value: 每年

data.name: Amount is required.
data.value: 金额是必需的。

data.name: (Please select a country)
data.value: （请选择一个国家）

data.name: Please enter your details below:
data.value: 请在下面输入您的详细信息

data.name: Submit Payment
data.value: 提交付款

data.name: The address at which you'd like to receive Renewal communications (optional, not related with card verification)
data.value: 您希望接收续订通讯的地址（可选，与卡验证无关）

data.name: Your card information
data.value: 您的卡信息

data.name: Your name as you'd like it to appear in our records (required)
data.value: 您希望显示在捐赠记录中的姓名（必填）

data.name: Donate
data.value: 捐款

data.name: To make a donation with Alipay, please select 'Open in Safari' from the context menu (three dots) at the top of your screen.
data.value: 为了使用支付宝进行捐款，请点击右上角菜单按钮（三个点）选择“在Safari打开”。

data.name: To make a donation with Alipay, please select 'Open with Browser' from the context menu (three dots) at the top of your screen.
data.value: 为了使用支付宝进行捐款，请点击右上角菜单按钮（三个点）选择“在浏览器打开”。

data.name: Please open this page in your browser.
data.value: 请在您的浏览器中打开此页面

data.name: Please enter a valid amount.
data.value: 请输入一个有效的金额。

data.name: When you give today, it will make a difference in the lives of people living on Shanghai's streets. We recently reinstated our women-only Thursdays to give women a chance to use the Renewal Center in a comfortable and safe environment. Your gift ensures we can continue to expand our important services.
data.value: 您在今天的捐赠将改变上海街头无家可归的人们。我们在日新中心重新开放了周四特别女性服务日，给所有女性受助者提供更加安全（和没有男性）的环境。您的捐赠能够帮我们继续并扩大这项重要的服务。

data.name: Your generous gift is transformed into education, food, shelter, job training, and hope for homeless men and women.
data.value: 唯一能帮助我们提供这些服务的就是您慷慨的捐助。您会在今天帮我们提供热腾腾的饭菜、防水的大衣和清爽的洗澡服务吗？

data.name: Homeless men and women need a place where they can feel safe
data.value: 无家可归的人们需要安全的家

data.name: Thank you for giving homeless women (and men) shelter and showers.
data.value: 感谢您为无家可归女性提供的住所和洗澡服务。

data.name: Helping people achieve their dreams
data.value: 帮助人们实现他们的梦想

data.name: Please help hard-working people gain the skills they need to make a better life.
data.value: 请帮助这些努力的人们获得学习技术的机会，从而开始更好的人生。

data.name: That's why your support started the residential job program. It gives people an opportunity to build the skills they need to find fulfilling jobs and to thrive in Shanghai (and beyond).
data.value: 这就是我们在您的支持下开始工作培训计划的原因。它使人们有机会学习独立自主所需的工作技巧，让他们能够找到一份工作，在上海（或其他地方）开始新的生活。

data.name: Wanting a job, a family, a safe place to live - these seem like simple and achievable dreams. But realizing these dreams can be almost impossible without the right resources.
data.value: 一份工作、一个家庭、一个安全的住所——这些听起来都是很简单很容易实现的梦想。但对有些人来说，即使这样的梦想也是遥不可及的。

data.name: Your gift provides meals, shelter and supports job training.
data.value: 您的捐赠提供健康的食物、安全的住宿和支持着我们的工作培训计划。

data.name: to provide one month hot meals and care.
data.value: 为无家可归男女提供一个月安全的住宿和温暖的帮助。

data.name: to provide one week of shelter and good meals.
data.value: 为无家可归男女提供一周安全的住宿和健康的食物。

data.name: to provide three nights of shelter for a homeless man or woman.
data.value: 为无家可归男女提供三个晚上安全的住宿。
